## Public Member Functions

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a94bec38d78b1f49fdeb91b1f96783bf8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void StackSafetyInfoWrapperPass::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/stacksafetyanalysis-h/#l00122">122</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/stacksafetyanalysis-h">StackSafetyAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/stacksafetyanalysis-cpp/#l01056">1056</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/stacksafetyanalysis-cpp">StackSafetyAnalysis.cpp</a>.

### print() {#a24bf1da96846eb94b2486f10d4961afb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void StackSafetyInfoWrapperPass::print (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
print - Print out the internal state of the pass.

This is called by Analyze to print out the contents of an analysis. Otherwise it is not necessary to implement this method. Beware that the module pointer MAY be null. This automatically forwards to a virtual function that does not provide the Module&#42; in case the analysis doesn&#39;t need it it can just be ignored.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/stacksafetyanalysis-h/#l00121">121</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/stacksafetyanalysis-h">StackSafetyAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/stacksafetyanalysis-cpp/#l01061">1061</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/stacksafetyanalysis-cpp">StackSafetyAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
